languages.text: "Бесчестное, бесхребетное, безбожное отродье! И вы смеете считать себя имперцами, мрази?! Вы недостойны даже получить от меня болт в голову — привилегию последней трусливой швали на фронте!"

"Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperium subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"
languages.original_text: "Бесчестное, бесхребетное, безбожное отродье! И вы смеете считать себя имперцами, мрази?! Вы недостойны даже получить от меня болт в голову — привилегию последней трусливой швали на фронте!"

traits.locale_text: "Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperial subjects? You scoundrels don't even deserve a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege any cowardly weasel on the front lines has!"

"Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperial subjects? You scoundrels don't even deserve a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege any cowardly weasel on the front lines has!"

"Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperial subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

"Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperial subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

"Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperium subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

languages.text: “你们这些没有尊严、没有骨气、不敬帝皇的懦夫！就你们这个熊样，还有脸自称帝国的子民？要是有哪个家伙上了前线临阵退缩，我就会照他们脑袋上来一枪！至于你们这两个人渣，甚至都不值得我浪费两颗子弹！”
languages.original_text: "Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperium subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

traits.locale_text: “你们这些没有尊严、没有骨气、不敬帝皇的懦夫！就你们这个熊样，还有脸自称帝国的子民？要是有哪个家伙上了前线临阵退缩，我就会照他们脑袋上来一枪！至于你们这两个人渣，甚至都不值得我浪费两颗子弹！”

languages.text: «¡Chusma hereje, cobarde y sin honor! ¿Y vosotros os hacéis llamar súbditos del Imperium? No merecéis ni un disparo de mi bólter, ¡y ese privilegio se concede a cualquier cobarde en el frente!».
languages.original_text: "Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperium subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Chusma hereje, cobarde y sin honor! ¿Y vosotros os hacéis llamar súbditos del Imperium? No merecéis ni un disparo de mi bólter, ¡y ese privilegio se concede a cualquier cobarde en el frente!».

languages.text: 「神を冒涜する恥知らずな根性なしどもめ！それでよくも帝国の臣下を名乗れるな！お前たちのような悪党には頭にボルトを食らわしてやるすら惜しい―前線にいる臆病者の方がよほど価値がある！」
languages.original_text: "Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperium subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

traits.locale_text: 「神を冒涜する恥知らずな根性なしどもめ！それでよくも帝国の臣下を名乗れるな！お前たちのような悪党には頭にボルトを食らわしてやるすら惜しい―前線にいる臆病者の方がよほど価値がある！」

languages.text: "Ehr-, rückgrat- und gottlose Schnösel! Und Ihr habt den Nerv, Euch Untertanen des Imperiums zu nennen? Ihr Mistkerle seid nicht mal einen Bolzen in den Kopf wert – und dieses Privileg wird an der Front sonst jedem feigen Wiesel gewährt!"
languages.original_text: "Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperium subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

traits.locale_text: "Ehr-, rückgrat- und gottlose Schnösel! Und Ihr habt den Nerv, Euch Untertanen des Imperiums zu nennen? Ihr Mistkerle seid nicht mal einen Bolzen in den Kopf wert – und dieses Privileg wird an der Front sonst jedem feigen Wiesel gewährt!"

languages.text: « Bande de vermines sans foi ni loi ! Où est votre honneur ? Vous osez vous prétendre des sujets de l'Imperium ? Vous ne méritez même pas que je vous tire une balle dans la tête, et c'est pourtant le sort réservé aux lâches qui désertent les premières lignes ! »
languages.original_text: "Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperium subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

traits.locale_text: « Bande de vermines sans foi ni loi ! Où est votre honneur ? Vous osez vous prétendre des sujets de l'Imperium ? Vous ne méritez même pas que je vous tire une balle dans la tête, et c'est pourtant le sort réservé aux lâches qui désertent les premières lignes ! »

languages.text: "Şerefsiz, omurgasız, tanrı tanımaz itler! Bir de kendinize İmparator kulu mu diyorsunuz? Siz hainler tek kurşunla infaza bile değmezsiniz. Kolay can vermek, ön cephedeki korkak kurnazlara bahşedilmiş bir ayrıcalıktır!"
languages.original_text: "Honourless, spineless, godless whelps! And you have the gall to call yourselves Imperium subjects? You scoundrels aren't even worthy of a bolt to the head from me — which is a privilege granted to any cowardly weasel on the front lines!"

traits.locale_text: "Onursuz, omurgasız, kâfir küstahlar! Bir de kendinize İmparatorluk tebaası demeye cüret mi ediyorsunuz? Siz hainler kafanızdan vurulmaya bile değmezsiniz. Öyle kolayca can vermek, ön cephedeki korkak kurnazlara bahşedilmiş bir ayrıcalıktır!"
